original_title: Sri Lanka investor forum by First Capital
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s First Capital Holdings said it will hold an investor forum on July 04,2023 covering areas including investment strategies, the economic outlook and privatization.

Nishan de Mel, the Executive Director of Verite Research, Suresh Shah, the Chairman of the SOE Reform Unit of the Government of Sri Lanka and Dimantha Mathew, Chief Research & Strategy Officer of First Capital Holdings PLC will be panelists of the First Capital Colombo Symposium 2023.
The forum themed as “Invest with impact, seize capital market opportunities”, is scheduled to take place at Shangri-La, Colombo.

“With a focus on building confidence and trust among the business community, corporates, and investors, First Capital strives to establish the event as the premier platform for sharing knowledge and networking within the investment industry.” First Capital said.

“By addressing critical subjects such as domestic debt optimization, it aims to equip attendees with the knowledge and tools needed to make effective investment decisions, ultimately leading to greater returns.” (Colombo/ June 27/2023)
